scripts.script_content: Now we've got Cass Daley singing A Good Man is Hard to Find. I wonder, does she mean it literally or figuratively when searching for that elusive good guy? Here's the song.

Now we've got Satchmo himself, Louis Armstrong, coming up next on the Appalachia Radio playlist. What a beautiful ballad "A Kiss to Build a Dream On". I wonder if he's singing about finding that special someone who makes all your dreams come true. or maybe just dreaming of love amidst life's challenges?
